## Uninstall global hotwater script {.unnumbered}


### Description

Uninstall global hotwater script



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>uninstall_hotwater(install_folder = "~/.local/bin/")
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="install_folder">install_folder</code></td>
<td>
[default &quot;~/.local/bin/&quot;] folder to uninstall hotwater
from.
</td></tr>
</table>


### See Also

install_hotwater



### Examples
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
library(hotwater)

if (interactive()) {
    hotwater::uninstall_hotwater()
}


```
